entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 3:37 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to periods of light snow overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
